result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

15CM704 - Ct. 1 (Intimidate Victim/Repeater)>>GUILTY

COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.
Defendant makes statement.

COURT ORDERS: 
15CF334 - Ct. 1>> 2 years TOTAL: 18 months incarceration and 6 months ES
15CF334 - Ct. 2>> 2 years TOTAL: 1 year incarceration and 1 year ES, concurrent to Ct. 1
15CM704 - Ct. 1>> 2 years TOTAL: 18 months incarceration and 6 months ES, CONSECUTIVE to Ct. 1 in 15CF334
CONDITIONS of ES>>Completion of SAFE program or its equivalent; Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO; N/C w/victim A.B. unless as approved by PO; DNA sample; CC including DNA surcharge in each count, and 2 D.A. surcharges in 15CF334 counts

>>CREDIT For time served in 15CF334 on each count of 140 days
>>CREDIT for time served in 15CM704 of 134 days
>>Defendant IS NOT eligible for either CIP or SAP in any case

COURT remands defendant to WI State Prison System.
